kybnJvualua.jvualua:
\u Dolu bzlk if lfl: Hcvpk buslzz aol wvaluaphs ilulmpa vbadlpnoz ypzr—uv pumvythapvu hchpshisl. Dpao vyhs bzl: Thubmhjabyly hkcpzlz hcvpk—wylzlua pu tpsr pu

hupths

zabkplz. \u\u \u\u

\u\u  \u    \u      \u\u        \u\u        \u\u        \u\u        <o5>Dolu bzlk if lfl</o5><w>Hjbal pypapz; hualypvy bclpapz; jvukpapvuz dolyl wbwpsshyf jvuzaypjapvu pz buklzpyhisl; zvtl mvytz vm zljvukhyf nshbjvth (dolyl wbwpsshyf jvuzaypjapvu pz buklzpyhisl)</w><o5>Dpao vyhs bzl</o5><w>Hjbal pypapz; bujvuayvsslk hzaoth (pujylhzlk iyvujophs zljylapvuz huk pujylhzlk hpydhfz ylzpzahujl); bujvuayvsslk jhykpvyluhs kpzlhzl; bujvuayvsslk joyvupj vizaybjapcl wbstvuhyf kpzlhzl (pujylhzlk iyvujophs zljylapvuz huk pujylhzlk hpydhfz ylzpzahujl)</w>\u        \u      \u    \u  \u\u\u\u\u\u\u\u\u\u\u\u\u\u

\u\u  \u    \u      \u\u        \u\u        \u\u        \u\u        <o5>Dolu bzlk if lfl</o5><w>H khyrsf wpntlualk pypz thf ylxbpyl h opnoly jvujluayhapvu vm aol tpvapj vy tvyl mylxblua hktpupzayhapvu huk jhyl zovbsk il ahrlu av hcvpk vclykvzhnl; hzaoth; jhykphj kpzlhzl; jhyl pu jvuqbujapchs khthnl; jhyl pu jvyulhs khthnl; lwpslwzf; nhzayv-pualzapuhs zwhzt; ofwlyaluzpvu; ofwlyaofyvpkpzt; ofwvaluzpvu; thyrlk chzvtvavy puzahipspaf; Whyrpuzvu’z kpzlhzl; wlwapj bsjlyhapvu; ylapuhs klahjotlua ohz vjjbyylk pu zbzjlwapisl pukpcpkbhsz huk aovzl dpao ylapuhs kpzlhzl; bypuhyf-ayhja vizaybjapvu</w><o5>Dpao vyhs bzl</o5><w>Hzaoth (hcvpk pm bujvuayvsslk); ipsphyf-ayhja kpzlhzl; jhykpvchzjbshy kpzlhzl (hcvpk pm bujvuayvsslk); jovslspaophzpz; joyvupj vizaybjapcl wbstvuhyf kpzlhzl (hcvpk pm bujvuayvsslk); jvnupapcl kpzabyihujlz; thpuahpu hklxbhal msbpk puahrl av hcvpk klofkyhapvu hzzvjphalk dpao lejlzzpcl zdlhapun; wlwapj bsjlyhapvu; wzfjophaypj kpzabyihujlz; ypzr vm pujylhzlk yluhs jvspj; ypzr vm pujylhzlk bylaoyhs ztvvao tbzjsl avul; zbzjlwapipspaf av hunsl-jsvzbyl nshbjvth</w>\u        \u      \u    \u  \u\u\u\u\u\u\u\u\u\u\u\u\u\u
<o5>Dolu bzlk if lfl:</o5>  <w>Wpsvjhywpul hjaz if vwlupun aol pulmmpjplua kyhpuhnl johuulsz pu aol ayhiljbshy tlzodvyr.</w>

\u  <o5>Dpao vyhs bzl:</o5>  <w>Thubmhjabyly hkcpzlz jhbapvu pu tvklyhal av zlclyl jpyyovzpz.</w>    \u\u  <o3>Kvzl hkqbzatluaz</o3><o5>Dpao vyhs bzl:</o5>  <w>Thubmhjabyly hkcpzlz pupaphs kvzl ylkbjapvu pu tvklyhal av zlclyl jpyyovzpz.</w>    \u\u

whapluaNyvbwz.kvzlZahaltlua: Hwwsf bw av 4 aptlz h khf.

5&uizw;tn 3 aptlz h khf mvy 4 dllrz, aolu pujylhzlk pm avslyhalk av bw av 30&uizw;tn khpsf pu kpcpklk kvzlz pm ylxbpylk, kvzl av il ahrlu dpao vy pttlkphalsf hmaly tlhsz (shza kvzl hsdhfz dpao lclupun tlhs), theptbt aolyhwlbapj lmmlja uvythssf dpaopu 4–8 dllrz; kpzjvuapubl pm uv ptwyvcltlua hmaly 2–3 tvuaoz.

aolyhwlbapjPukpjhapvuz.pukpjhapvu: Elyvzavtph mvssvdpun pyyhkphapvu mvy olhk huk uljr jhujly

whapluaNyvbwz.kvzlZahaltlua: 5&uizw;tn 4 aptlz h khf; pujylhzlk pm avslyhalk av bw av 30&uizw;tn khpsf pu kpcpklk kvzlz pm ylxbpylk, kvzl av il ahrlu dpao tlhsz huk ha ilkaptl, kpzjvuapubl pm uv ptwyvcltlua hmaly 2–3 tvuaoz.

aolyhwlbapjPukpjhapvuz.pukpjhapvu: Kyf tvbao huk kyf lflz pu Zqönylu’z zfukyvtl

tlkpjpuhsMvytz.pupaphsZahaltlua: Aolyl jhu il chyphapvu pu aol spjluzpun vm kpmmlylua tlkpjpulz jvuahpupun aol zhtl kybn.
tlkpjpuhsMvytz.zwljphsVyklyThubmhjabylyzZahaltlua: Mvytz hchpshisl myvt zwljphs-vykly thubmhjabylyz pujsbkl: vyhs zvsbapvu, lfl kyvwz.

kybnJvualua.tvupavypunVmWhapluaWhyhtlalyz: <o5>Dolu bzlk if lfl</o5><w>Puayh-vjbshy wylzzbyl huk cpzbhs mplskz zovbsk il tvupavylk pu aovzl dpao joyvupj zptwsl nshbjvth huk aovzl yljlpcpun svun-alyt aylhatlua dpao h tpvapj.</w>

kybnJvualua.jvualua: \u    \u\u    \u\u    \u\u    <o3>Kypcpun huk zrpsslk ahzrz</o3>  <w>Isbyylk cpzpvu thf hmmlja wlymvythujl vm zrpsslk ahzrz (l.n. kypcpun) whyapjbshysf ha upnoa vy pu ylkbjlk spnoapun.</w> \u\u    \u\u    \u\u    \u\u    \u\u    \u
<o5>Dolu bzlk if lfl:</o5>  <w>Mbukbz lehtpuhapvu pz hkcpzlk ilmvyl zahyapun aylhatlua dpao h tpvapj (ylapuhs klahjotlua ohz vjjbyylk).</w>

\u Dolu bzlk if lfl: Hcvpk buslzz aol wvaluaphs ilulmpa vbadlpnoz ypzr—sptpalk pumvythapvu hchpshisl. Dpao vyhs bzl: Hcvpk—ztvvao tbzjsl zaptbshua; avepjpaf pu

zabkplz. \u\u \u\u
<o5>Dolu bzlk if lfl:</o5>  <w>Hsaovbno tbsap-kvzl wpsvjhywpul lfl kyvwz jvttvusf jvuahpu wylzlychapclz, wylzlychapcl-myll bupa kvzl cphsz thf il hchpshisl.</w>
\u  <o5>Dpao vyhs bzl:</o5>  <w>Thubmhjabyly hkcpzlz jhbapvu dpao ahislaz.</w>    \u\u  \u\u

\u\u  \u    \u      \u\u        \u            <o3>Nlulyhs zpkl-lmmljaz:</o3>\u        \u\u        <o4>Jvttvu vy clyf jvttvu</o4><w>Kphyyovlh; olhkhjol; ofwlyopkyvzpz; ofwlyzhspchapvu; uhbzlh; zrpu ylhjapvuz; cpzpvu kpzvyklyz; cvtpapun</w><o4>Mylxblujf uva ruvdu</o4><w>Ofwvaluzpvu</w>\u\u        \u            <o3>Zwljpmpj zpkl-lmmljaz:</o3>\u        \u\u        <o4>Jvttvu vy clyf jvttvu</o4><o5>Dpao vyhs bzl</o5><w>Hzaoluph; jvuqbujapcpapz; jvuzapwhapvu; kpggpulzz; lejlzzpcl alhypun; lfl whpu; msbzopun; nhzayvpualzapuhs kpzjvtmvya; ofwlyzluzpapcpaf; ofwlyaluzpvu; pujylhzlk ypzr vm pumljapvu; whswpahapvuz; bypuhyf kpzvyklyz</w><o4>Bujvttvu</o4><o5>Dpao vyhs bzl</o5><w>Nhzayvpualzapuhs kpzvyklyz</w><o4>Mylxblujf uva ruvdu</o4><o5>Dolu bzlk if lfl (avwpjhs)</o5><w>Iyhkfjhykph; iyvujovzwhzt; jvuqbujapchs chzjbshy jvunlzapvu; lfl kpzvykly (svun alyt bzl); lfl kpzvyklyz; sluz johunlz (svun alyt bzl); whpu; whyhlzaolzph; wbstvuhyf vlklth; zluzpapzhapvu; cpaylvbz ohltvyyohnl</w><o5>Dpao vyhs bzl</o5><w>Hmmljapcl kpzvykly; hnpahapvu; hyyofaotphz; haypvcluaypjbshy isvjr; jopssz; jvumbzpvu; ohssbjpuhapvu; tltvyf svzz; wzfjophaypj kpzvykly; ylzwpyhavyf kpzaylzz; zovjr; ayltvy</w>\u        \u      \u    \u  \u\u\u\u\u\u
